author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

HGCal geometry modified to remove some overlaps and get more up-to-date structure of absorber in the CE-H part

#### PR validation:

The workflow needs to be defined. The changes are modified with some test detector scenarios.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

It is not a backport. But it may be back ported later to 10_5 version
title: Phase2-hgx183 Second set of work for V10 geometry of HGCal
